mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.user_email, u.user_name, u.user_gender, u.user_phone, u.user_created_at, u.user_updated_at, g.group_id, g.generation_id, g.group_code FROM soma.soma_user u LEFT OUTER JOIN soma.soma_group g ON u.user_id = g.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY u.user_id DESC
SELECT user_id AS userId, user_email AS userEmail, user_name AS userName, user_password AS userPassword FROM soma.soma_user WHERE user_email = #{userEmail} ORDER BY user_id DESC

SELECT u.user_id, u.user_email, u.user_name, u.user_gender, u.user_phone, u.user_created_at, u.user_updated_at, g.group_id, g.generation_id, g.group_code FROM soma.soma_user u LEFT OUTER JOIN soma.soma_group g ON u.user_id = g.user_id ORDER BY u.user_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO soma.soma_user ( user_email, user_password, user_name, user_gender, user_phone, user_created_at, user_updated_at ) VALUES ( #{userEmail}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userGender}, #{userPhone}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP );
mapper.update: UPDATE soma.soma_user SET user_updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, user_name = COALESCE(#{userName}, user_name), user_password = COALESCE(#{userPassword}, user_password), user_phone = COALESCE(#{userPhone}, user_phone), user_gender = COALESCE(#{userGender}, user_gender) WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM soma.soma_group WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND group_code = #{groupCode}
